Name: Desert Mystery
About the game: Desert Mystery is a hardcore tactical first person shooter, where your main mission is to eliminate any threat blocking your way, find the hidden exit and escape the enemy lines You find yourself surrounded by huge amounts of enemies, all alone in a secluded area, with no help arround, and your only thought in the moment is to escape. You find a 2 weapons that might come in handy and some ammo. You can either go in guns blazing or play it safe, that's going to be your own decision. Find the hidden exit and escape the enemy lines Game features: -Shoot every terrorist standing your way -Collect guns, ammunition and supplies -Find the hidden exit -Hardcore gameplay -Tactical shooter -Requires a strategic playstyle
